title: Bonus Episode 6 - The Investigators
description:
Clips from our new live recording, The Investigators, available for sale at [nightvale.bandcamp.com](nightvale.bandcamp.com).

More Info: welcometonightvale.com. Click on Live Shows for US Tour dates. You can also join our email list.

Follow @NightValeRadio on Twitter or Facebook to stay up to date on news and weird jokes.
